short_summary: Supply and delivery of Campus Vehicles
description: This is a retender to provide a national master standing offer for the supply and delivery of Campus Vehicles which are defined within this Standing Offer as Electric Golf Carts and Low Speed Vehicles (LSV). The offer will have a term of one firm year and four optional years.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Standing Offer for Campus Vehicles

**Reference Number:** WS3447020913-Doc3793645619
**Solicitation Number:** WS3447020913
**Publication Date:** January 17, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** February 21, 2023 (14:00 HAE)

**Request Details**

The Department of Public Services and Procurement Canada invites interested suppliers to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for Campus Vehicles. This RSO is a re-tender and supersedes the previous solicitation, WS3447020913 - Doc3662853935.

**Supply and Delivery Requirements**

The contracting authority requires a National Master Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of Campus Vehicles, which are defined as Electric Golf Carts and Low Speed Vehicles (LSV). The Standing Offer will have a term of one (1) firm year and four (4) optional years.

**Locations and Delivery**

Delivery will be made to locations across Canada.

**Notice Type**

This is a Competitive-Open Bidding procurement process.

**Evaluation Criteria**

Selection will be based on the Lowest Price.

**AMENDMENT**

The Tender Closing Date has been updated to February 21, 2023 (14:00 HAE). Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by this date and time.

**Debriefing**

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of the results. Debriefings may be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person.

**Procurement Category**

This procurement falls under the General Government (GD) category.

**Areas of Delivery**

Delivery areas include Canada.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is covered under various trade agreements, including the Canada-EU Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP). For more information, please refer to the attached trade agreements.

**Regions of Opportunity**

None.

**Inquiries and Contact Information**

For more information and to access the tender documents, visit the Ariba Discovery website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15155421?extsite=MTUxNTU0MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

Please contact Dustin Levere (SPAC/PSPC
